DRAW Tools module¶

This module collects set of classes responsible for configuring and executing tool commands

Tools¶

class tools.Bowtie(input, output, params, sequence)¶
build()¶

Exectue build command that create index files for Hisat2

prepare_to_run()¶

Performs set of operations necessary to execute tool

class tools.FastQC(input, output_dir, user_params)¶

FastQC master class

Add input argument to tool command

check_params()¶

Checks if there are any parameters that are not allowed

Raises

ToolError – some parameters that are disallowed

class tools.Tool(input, output_dir, user_params)¶

Class responsible for executing tools with proper parameters

Parameters

  • input (list) – input params

  • output_dir (str) – directory where files will be saved
